## Description

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update

## Related Issues
Closes #<!-- Issue number -->

## How to Test
<!-- Describe how to test your changes -->

## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have run `black .` to format my code
- [ ] I have run `pylint` and addressed any issues
- [ ] I have run `flake8` and addressed any issues
- [ ] I have added comments for complex logic

### Security & Testing
- [ ] My code does not introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not committed any secrets, API keys, or sensitive data
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] I have added/updated tests if applicable

### CI Pipeline
- [ ] All GitHub Actions checks pass
- [ ] No new CodeQL security alerts
- [ ] No new secret detections
- [ ] Code quality metrics are maintained or improved

<!-- Any additional information that reviewers should know -->
